name: change_exterior_wall_thermal_properties

arguments.name: r_value_mult
arguments.display_name: Multiplier for R-value of the Exterior Walls

arguments.name: solar_abs_mult
arguments.display_name: Multiplier for Solar Absorptance of the outer layer of Exterior Walls

arguments.name: thermal_mass_mult
arguments.display_name: Multiplier for Thermal Mass of the Exterior Walls

modeler_description: Tunes all exterior wall surfaces by providing separate calibration multipliers to thermal resistance, thermal mass, and solar absorptance.
description: Allows calibration of exterior walls by altering the thermal resistance, density, and solar absorptance of the wall constructions independently.
